basics.name: M. Raşit Özgün
basics.label: Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: As a full stack web developer capable of building apps from the ground up, so far I have worked mostly as a freelancer and contractor. I am very flexible when it comes to investigating new projects, also I prioritize user feedback first and foremost all the while being a product-focused developer.

work.name: Veritfy
work.summary: Manage end-to-end web development and deployment, ensuring seamless integration across frontend, backend, and server operations. Deliver robust, scalable solutions from code to deployment.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Providing tailored solutions across languages, I deliver high-quality web applications that meet diverse client needs, backed by experience in both frontend and backend technologies.

work.name: Demirören Technology / iddaa.com
work.summary: During my time as a web development intern, I worked with Next.js, Styled Components, Redux, and WebSocket, improving my UI, data management, and teamwork skills.

volunteer.summary: I helped families find their missing loved ones after an earthquake by creating a small website that organized hospital lists into meaningful data, making it easier for people to locate patients. This effort was part of a larger initiative with the open-source software community to assist those affected by the disaster.

projects.name: Vinventory (Veritfy Stock)
projects.description: With my team, I created Verify Stock, an inventory management system integrated with PHP backend using Next.js, Zustand, TypeScript, and TanStack Query. This project is VeritfyTech's first product. It was a project where I thoroughly learned teamwork.
